nodes.text: The Osako pirates were a pirate organization active during the era of the New Republic. After Poe Dameron joined the Spice Runners of Kijimi, Dameron's father Kes Dameron and his friend L'ulo L'ampar made a deal with the Osako pirates to find him. The pirates, piloting Karura-class ships, attacked Dameron's cell of the Spice Runners during a heist, forcing their starship to land on the planet Judakann.
